p: Marbofloxacin was overall the most effective molecule (63.1% sensitivity), followed by Cefovecin (58.6%), Ceftriaxone (55.1%), Enrofloxacin (54%) and Pradofloxacin (53.3%). Escherichia coli showed the highest sensibility versus Cefovecin (70%), Marbofloxacin (67.2%), Trimetoprim/Sulphamide (64.3%), Ceftriaxone (63.5%), Pradofloxacin (61.5%) and Enrofloxacin (60.9%).
